name: Challenge #2: The first long trip.
description: In this challenge you must take the Vehicle from City “A” to City “C”. This gets a little dificult because to get there you must pass through City "B". Good luck!
helpText: In this challenge your task is to move the single <c>Vehicle</c> from <c>City</c> "A" to <c>City</c> "C";
While not being essential to win this challenge, the event <e c="Vehicle">visitCity</e> is worth learning as it is useful for later challenges;
Remember, to move a <c>Vehicle</c>, use the method <m c="Vehicle">moveTo</m>;
Using the property <m c="City">id</m> from <c>City</c> class can help you set directions;

victory.text: Deliver the single car to city "C"
victory.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, game) { return vehicles[0].lastCity.id == 'C'; }

defeat.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, game) { return game.elapsedTimeSeconds > 15; }
